config.autofish.enabled.name: Enable auto-fishing on load
config.autofish.enabled.tooltip: Start each session with auto-fishing toggled on.
config.autofish.key.name: Toggle auto-fishing key
config.autofish.key.tooltip: Press to enable or disable the auto-fishing behavior.
config.maxCastPower.name: Max cast power
config.maxCastPower.tooltip: Force the rod to cast with maximum power.
config.autoHit.name: Auto hit
config.autoHit.tooltip: Automatically hook the fish as soon as it bites.
config.fastBite.name: Fast bite
config.fastBite.tooltip: Reduce bite time so fish bite more quickly.
config.fasterSpeed.name: Faster bobber movement
config.fasterSpeed.tooltip: Increase bobber bar movement speed for quicker catches.
config.catchTreasure.name: Catch treasure
config.catchTreasure.tooltip: Attempt to capture treasure when progress is above 75% and the fish isn't legendary.
config.autoLootFishAndTrash.name: Auto-loot fish and trash
config.autoLootFishAndTrash.tooltip: Automatically pick up fish and trash debris nearby.
config.autoLootTreasure.name: Auto-loot treasure
config.autoLootTreasure.tooltip: Automatically pick up treasure drops nearby.
